text: Well, this is weird. A new report claims that FKA Twigs has been leaning on Robert Pattinson ’ s ex, Kristen Stewart, for advice about their relationship. Hmm. Is Kristen Stewart, 26, doling out love advice to her ex ’ s fiancee? One shocking report claims that FKA Twigs, 28, has been reaching out to the Twilight actress in hopes of figuring out her future husband, Robert Pattinson, 29. Uh oh. Is there trouble in paradise for the future Mr. and Mrs. Pattinson? Unfortunately, a new report claims that Rob is “ off the rails, ” and that his fiancee, FKA Twigs, is having trouble reaching him.
